snippet: A collection of apps like Geography Quiz Game 3D and Guess the Place can help you brush up on your world knowledge.
abstract: Kit Eaton App Smart column highlights educational and entertaining geography apps.
lead_paragraph: A collection of apps like Geography Quiz Game 3D and Guess the Place can help you brush up on your world knowledge.

headline.print_headline: Letting Your Fingers Do the Globe-Trotting
headline.main: Video Feature: Using Apps to Let Your Fingers Do the Globe-Trotting
